content: It seems like you may have made a typo. Did you mean "avatars" or something else? Let me know how I can assist you!
Sing a song in french that rhymes

Here is a simple French nursery rhyme that rhymes:

Fais dodo, Colas mon p'tit frère,
Fais dodo, t'auras du lolo.
Maman est en haut,
Qui fait du gâteau,
Papa est en bas,
Qui fait du chocolat.

I hope you enjoyed this little rhyme! Let me know if you would like to hear more.
